__e: Well-- we don't want to believe daddy because we don't want to believe that we were taken in too.
They think it can't be that old and they think it can't be that big, for so many people to have fallen for it.
He's probably laughing at us now, watching us jump through his hoops.
Yeah, but, honey, you were running right behind him just before he fell down the shaft.
Just because Rose was too clever to be taken in doesn't mean that she'd forgive you.
